summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 661 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1610 m), and light levels (up 4029 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 660.8m lower than yesterday, 577.2m lower than the past week, 1610.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1063.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1640.6m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, very clammy and humid and winds will be practically absent. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
